ygData.subject: Re: RE: centaur armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Everyone has to remember that just because you have HUGE CHA stats, doesn t mean you going to get BETTER prices. This is where your faction for that person, or
ygData.messageBody:
Everyone has to remember that just because you have HUGE CHA stats, doesn't mean you going to get
BETTER prices.

This is where your faction for that person, or area comes into play. If they con to you *When you
target and click c*, dubiously, then your going to get good prices, if they con indifferently, then
your going to get awful prices, now if they con admiably, your rocken the prices will be low, and
thus a high CHA will help you out in this area indeed.

So, it doesn't matter if you have high CHA, if they don't con right ya paying more, If you have low
CHA, and con high, ya pay less, go figure but that's how it works out.

Thulgar
